column2: The great [Root.GetTitledName], leader of the great empire of the Mongols, has died. According to [Root.GetHerHis] last wishes, [Root.GetSheHe] has split the Mongol horde into three parts: one in the north to be led by [first_mongol_heir.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], one in the south to be led by [second_mongol_heir.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], and the remaining lands in Transoxania to be led by [third_mongol_heir.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]. All of the western world waits with bated breath to see if these men will begin a renewed siege upon their lands, or whether they will fall into infighting and civil war.
This is how it shall be
Hopefully this means a reprieve is at hand
